name: Calgary Folk Fest
description: A website for a local music festival with well over 40 years of rich history in the heart of downtown Calgary, AB.

content.concept: Calgary Folk Fest is a local music festival that has been running for over 40 years. They  needed a digital refresh to match its cultural significance. Their outdated website contained extensive content that required re-imagining.
content.solution: As part of a small team, we built them a brand new solution from the ground up with Next.js, StrapiCMS and MySQL - hosted on AWS. on top of developing the frontend, I was also largely responsible for architecture and infrastructure.

name: Vista Crossing
description: A residential community website in Crossfield, AB as part of a larger suite of developments by Dream Homes.

content.concept: Vista Crossing is a newly developed residential community in Crossfield, AB. This website is part of a larger suite of developments by Dream Homes.
content.solution: As part of a small team, we built them a modern digital new solution from the ground up with Wordpress, Laravel(PHP), jQuery, Sass and MySQL - hosted on AWS.

name: Tedana App
description: A desktop application for Tedana - a program for multi-echo fMRI processing using Tauri, Rust and React.

content.concept: Multi-echo fMRI is a relatively new concept in the world of neuroscience. It is not very well understood and not yet integrated into current data processing pipelines.
content.solution: I sought to create a tool to make it easier to use Tedana, and used this as a medium to develop with Tauri, a new framework for building modern desktop applications.
